content.p: Our accommodation services make finding somewhere to live simple and stress free. We can help you book your accommodation and find somewhere that's right for you. We're on hand to answer any accommodation questions you have before you arrive and once you're living here. And, if you experience any problems, we can advise you on how to change your accommodation. Explore your accommodation options Pay your accommodation fees Accommodation due dates and alternative payment options You can find everything you need to know on our accommodation website. If you need to contact us use our online form or live chat. If you have any specific requirements for accommodation due to medical or religious reasons, just let us know when you apply.
